actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Judiciary.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Economic and Commercial Law

official_title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to grant to the President line-item veto authority.

summary.text: Constitutional Amendment - Grants the President line-item veto authority. Requires the President, following disapproval of an item of appropriation, to return such item to the House in which the bill or resolution originated. Authorizes the Congress to override such veto by a three-fifths vote of each House.

titles.title: Proposing an amendment to the Constitution of the United States to grant to the President line-item veto authority.
